item.title: Introduction
item.description: ProBIND3 is a web application designed for managing the DNS zones for one or more servers running the ISC BIND DNS server software. It works best for companies that need to manage a medium-sized pool of domains across a set of servers. The application has been written using Laravel framework. It stores its data in a database (see Laravel Database Backend) and generates configuration files for BIND on-demand. What ProBIND3 Is ProBIND3 is meant to be a time-saving tool for busy administrators, aiding in managing the configuration of DNS zones across multiple servers.
